title: Fix typo in billing requests documentation
author: Cubox
details: Fixed a typo in Copilot billing documentation by adding a missing closing parenthesis after listing models
Corrected syntax in the paid plan description to ensure proper formatting
No functional changes to billing logic or content meaning
